page.title: 14CONVENT LIFE,BOLTON
page.content: Sister Pauline iss the head nun of Mount St.Josephs convent.She has decisions to make about the running of the convent and the care of the grounds and of the sick. The convent was built in 1882.The sixth form block was added on in 1912.It was as a boarding school for a number of years. In the convent they cook,clean,take care of the sacristy and chapel,look after the gardens and grounds. The nuns in the convent have decreased over the years.There used to be 60 to 80 nuns in the first 60 to 70 years.The Novices who were also here at that time,were moved.There are 20 nuns in the convent in 1985,six of them teach. The sisters in the convent are of the ORDER OF THE CROSS AND PASSION.
